title: 7 RP Until 440. Anyway I can get that without sending in a support ticket?
body: Id rather not wait 2 weeks just for 7 RP and Im sure as hell not spending $10 just for 7  RP. Pls rito

replies.body: We'd like to help with this!  It won't take that long for a response, but if you don't want to put in a ticket then [send a tweet ](https://twitter.com/riotsupport)over to Riot Support.  Good luck!
